name: Judge II
script:
cecho("<blue>

Behead / Cleave! BEHEAD / CLEAVE!
<red>Behead / Cleave! BEHEAD / CLEAVE!
Behead / Cleave! BEHEAD / CLEAVE!

")
matches: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) swings the crackling mace about h(?:is|er) head, gathering momentum as s?he bears down on you\.$
^([A-Z][a-z]+)'s mace begins to make a high-pitched keening sound as it rapidly spins over h(?:is|er) head\. You have only moments left to escape before you are judged\!$
